    public class AbapTypeTracker
extends TypeTrackerBase

    • Method Detail

      • getSeparateScopeSubtypes

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSeparateScopeSubtypes()
        Returns all statement sub-types that need a separate scope. In ABAP, there are no control-flow entities which open a new variable scope. All variables within a method are visible throughout that method.
        Specified by:
        getSeparateScopeSubtypes in class TypeTrackerBase

      • needsOrderedScope

        protected boolean needsOrderedScope(ShallowEntity entity)
        Returns whether the given entity needs an ordered scope. This is used e.g. for methods or statements, where variables are only accessible if they have been introduced in an entity earlier in the code. Other entities like types don't need an ordered scope, because introduced attributes are visible everywhere within the class. The default implementation returns true if the given entity's type is contained in TypeTrackerBase.ORDERED_ENTITY_TYPES. Subclasses may override this in order to provide language-specific behavior. In ABAP you can even access local variables before you define them.
        Overrides:
        needsOrderedScope in class TypeTrackerBase

      • initialize

        protected void initialize(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> rootEntities)
        Performs initialization steps for the given set of root entities. This is intended to be overwritten by subclasses. The default implementation does nothing. Saves the rootEntities for later use in getAdditionalParent(ShallowEntity).
        Overrides:
        initialize in class TypeTrackerBase

      • getAdditionalParent

        protected java.util.Optional<ShallowEntity> getAdditionalParent(ShallowEntity entity)
        Returns an additional shallowEntity whose type information scope should be visible for the given entity. This is intended to be overwritten by subclasses. The default implementation an empty optional. For class and method implementations, returns the respective declaration entity.
        Overrides:
        getAdditionalParent in class TypeTrackerBase
